subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the founder of the Mauryan Empire?
question_hi: मौर्य साम्राज्य के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Chandragupta Maurya was the founder of the Mauryan Empire.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य मौर्य साम्राज्य के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Which ancient Indian king is known for his extensive empire that stretched from present-day Afghanistan to Bangladesh?
question_hi: कौन से प्राचीन भारतीय राजा को अपने विस्तृत साम्राज्य के लिए जाना जाता है जो वर्तमान अफगानिस्तान से बांग्लादेश तक फैला था?
explanation_en: Samudragupta is known for his extensive empire that stretched from present-day Afghanistan to Bangladesh.
explanation_hi: समुद्रगुप्त को अपने विस्तृत साम्राज्य के लिए जाना जाता है जो वर्तमान अफगानिस्तान से बांग्लादेश तक फैला था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Battle of Panipat was fought in which year?
question_hi: पानीपत की लड़ाई किस वर्ष में लड़ी गई थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Panipat was fought in 1526, 1556, and 1761.
explanation_hi: पानीपत की लड़ाई 1526, 1556 और 1761 में लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the famous Mughal emperor who built the Taj Mahal?
question_hi: कौन से प्रसिद्ध मुगल सम्राट ने ताजमहल का निर्माण करवाया था?
explanation_en: Shah Jahan was the famous Mughal emperor who built the Taj Mahal.
explanation_hi: शाहजहां प्रसिद्ध मुगल सम्राट थे जिन्होंने ताजमहल का निर्माण करवाया था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The ancient Indian city of Mohenjo-Daro was located in which present-day country?
question_hi: प्राचीन भारतीय शहर मोहनजोदड़ो वर्तमान में किस देश में स्थित है?
explanation_en: The ancient Indian city of Mohenjo-Daro was located in present-day Pakistan.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन भारतीय शहर मोहनजोदड़ो वर्तमान में पाकिस्तान में स्थित है।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the leader of the Indian Rebellion of 1857?
question_hi: 1857 के भारतीय विद्रोह के नेता कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mangal Pandey, Rani Lakshmibai, and Tatya Tope were all leaders of the Indian Rebellion of 1857.
explanation_hi: मंगल पांडे, रानी लक्ष्मीबाई और तात्या टोपे सभी 1857 के भारतीय विद्रोह के नेता थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The famous ancient Indian university of Nalanda was located in which present-day state?
question_hi: प्रसिद्ध प्राचीन भारतीय विश्वविद्यालय नालंदा वर्तमान में किस राज्य में स्थित था?
explanation_en: The famous ancient Indian university of Nalanda was located in present-day Bihar.
explanation_hi: प्रसिद्ध प्राचीन भारतीय विश्वविद्यालय नालंदा वर्तमान में बिहार में स्थित था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the founder of the Delhi Sultanate?
question_hi: दिल्ली सल्तनत के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Qutb-ud-din Aibak was the founder of the Delhi Sultanate.
explanation_hi: कुतुब-उद-दीन ऐबक दिल्ली सल्तनत के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought in which year?
question_hi: हल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई किस वर्ष में लड़ी गई थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought in 1576.
explanation_hi: हल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई 1576 में लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Bhartiya Itihas ki Mahatvapurna Ghatnaye (Ancient & Medieval)
question_en: Who was the famous female ruler of the Maratha Empire?
question_hi: मराठा साम्राज्य की प्रसिद्ध महिला शासक कौन थीं?
explanation_en: Rani Tarabai was the famous female ruler of the Maratha Empire.
explanation_hi: रानी ताराबाई मराठा साम्राज्य की प्रसिद्ध महिला शासक थीं।
